channel.title: Veng need help

item.title: Veng need help
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

i have made a actiontimer and a message but its send that message but if i use its send they message wen i casted
here is they code

[code]inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
setAnimation(1914);
actionTimer = 60;
txt4 = "LULZ! YOU’VE JUST BEEN

PWNED!!!";
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();
}
}
}

            sendMessage("Brian lends you his powers to VENG!");
            if (actionTimer == 60) 
            sendMessage("You need to wait another 60secs.");     

            break;[/code]

I just started to code things can someone say what i did wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2009, 12:23:50 pm[/size][hr]Fixed myself
if you wanna now they command its this:

[code]}
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
setAnimation(1914);
actionTimer = 60;
txt4 = “Taste Vengeance! AND DIE!!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();
}
}
}
if (actionTimer >= 60) {
sendMessage(“Saradomin gives you ULTIMATE POWERS!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to wait 60secs”);

          }
            break;[/code]

Read full topic
